column4: you about with any time for this: I did some upgrades a couple of weeks ago and sound did not work since then I have a soundblaster audigy 2 and it used to work ok, now in the place of the start up "music" I hear a distorted version of the tune very low in volume nothing looks muted in alsamixer
it is here, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/20591 thanks for looking
it is here, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/20591 thanks for looking
sorry I am now debating with myself if the card type is correct
if that's the output from asoundconf list, then it's correct.
I'll certify the ca0106 - google is saying audigy SE
does resetting the mixer levels help?
no, still sounds like medium wave in the 60s with no channel :-)
a transistor radio in the 60's all hiss no music
I have to go, unfortunately I have to get up early in the morning :-( thanks for the attention, maybe I can call back tomorrow
